pullrequest.title: Fix #19, direct all messages to std_err, remove errStream variable, since it is never used

content.raw: I'm interested in knowing what kind of problems were causing in gazebo and if any of them was cover by our test suite. Please describe the effect and I can taka care of writting a test for this in gazebo integration suite.
content.html: I'm interested in knowing what kind of problems were causing in gazebo and if any of them was cover by our test suite. Please describe the effect and I can taka care of writting a test for this in gazebo integration suite.
